name: Margarine: Quest for Lasagna
description:
Professor Bechamel has no food left in his fridge.
What to do?
Get some lasagna from the moon, of course!

Play as Margarine – Professor Bechamel's assistant – and run, jump and ground pound your way around Buttermilk Island to collect the machine parts the professor needs for building his rocketship.

Enjoy the nice weather and collect some beautiful shells on your way around the island, but remember to watch out for the wavy waters and rickety robots!
